content: In #Machine Learning for Theorem Proving > benchmarks we were just talking about benchmarks for formal verification. I just found a paper on one: DafnyBench: A Benchmark for Formal Software Verification. I haven’t read it yet. It seems to be about Dafny which I don’t know a lot about, but looks really interesting.
Unfortunately I don’t know if any of the authors are on this Zulip.
I began learning Dafny last week, so I'm looking forward to using LLMs to verify programs written in Dafny.
